    account - Package account
     
    Account - Klasse in account
    Represents a user account with a username and password.
    Account(String, String) - Konstruktor für Klasse account.Account
    Constructs an account with the given username and password.
    AccountManager - Klasse in controllers
    A utility class for managing the currently logged-in account.
    accounts - Variable in Klasse server.ServerContext
     
    AccountStorage - Klasse in server
    A utility class for storing and retrieving a list of Account objects to and from a JSON file located in the user's operating system-specific application data directory.
    AccountStorage() - Konstruktor für Klasse server.AccountStorage
